description: Heckenlights is the christmas lights installation in Heckenpfad, Weinheim Germany. Take control over Heckenlights using your MIDI files.
about_takecontrol: Watch. Play music. Take control. Tweet #Heckenlights
about_lead:
Heckenlights is a christmas lights installation located in Heckenpfad, Weinheim Germany. It plays to christmas music and is controlled via MIDI. Heckenlights allows you to control and watch it play. Send tweets using #Heckenlights and see them on the messagebox. Become a program director for Heckenlights by using your personal christmas MIDI music.

Heckenlights start on 5pm CET Dec. 1st 2014 and will be available until Jan. 6th 2015. As christmas lights are fancier at night Heckenlights will operate daily between 5 pm (CET) to 10 pm (CET) and 5 am (CET) to 8 am (CET).
info_offline: As christmas lights are fancier at night Heckenlights will operate daily between 5 pm (CET) to 10 pm (CET) and 5 am (CET) to 8 am (CET).
index_captcha: You need to solve the captcha in order to upload MIDI files for Heckenlights.
index_intro1: Heckenlights is a christmas lights installation playing christmas songs. You can watch, listen to and submit your own christmas music.
index_legal_oss: Heckenlights is a free, non-profit, just for fun and open source project. Heckenlights has been created to give pleasure during christmas time. Everyone is welcome to enjoy it!
index_legal_pd: Christmas music can be either copyrighted work or public domain. I do not want to infringe any of these copyrights. If you wish to upload christmas songs that will be playing on Heckenlights, please make sure that these works are either public domain or that you own the rights for performing. If you're not sure about public domain so https://songclearance.com or PDInfo are good starting points.
index_legal_contact: Heckenlights played a song that breached your copyright? Please contact legal@heckenlights.org
index_hint_delay: Live stream is delayed by 10 to 20 seconds.
index_hint_nothing_happening: Nothing happens? You see lights but they're not sparkling? You do not hear any music? The playlist is most probably empty. Submit a track using either the presets or upload a MIDI file.
index_upload_info: Do you have MIDI files? Upload your christmas tracks to heckenlights.org. Track duration must be between 10 seconds and 5 minutes.
internal_server_error: There was an internal server error, could not validate your request.
captcha_validation_error: Validation not successful. Please enter the displayed words/numbers.

Aw, snap!

Could not submit your file to the queue. Check if whether your file is a GM MIDI-File.

Please come back when it's open again.

Enqeued your track __track__!
It will be played in a few seconds.
enqueue_success_plural:
Enqeued your track __track__!

enqueue_tweet: Uploaded __track__ at http://heckenlights.org. Come, hear and see it in __count__ seconds #Heckenlights
enqueue_tweet_now: Uploaded __track__ at http://heckenlights.org. Come, hear and see it now. #Heckenlights
